items.content_html: A lightweight Database built with Node.js using raw TCP sockets, capable of handling Redis commands like GET, SET, MGET, INCR, and hash operations and many more. It stores data in memory and supports expiration, with plans to add persistence (AOF/RDB), LRU caching, and scalability features like sharding and worker threads for better performance.
items.title: R0LEX7/RolexDB: A lightweight Database built with Node.js using raw TCP sockets, capable of handling Redis commands like GET, SET, MGET, INCR, and hash operations and many more. It stores data in memory and supports expiration, with plans to add persistence (AOF/RDB), LRU caching, and scalability features like sharding and worker threads for better performance.

items.content_html: 42resources is a lightweight browser extension designed to assist 42 students in finding relevant resources for their projects. It provides curated links to blogs, videos, and testing tools, making it easier for users to learn, debug, and improve their work.
items.title: open-source-multiverse/42resources-extention: 42resources is a lightweight browser extension designed to assist 42 students in finding relevant resources for their projects. It provides curated links to blogs, videos, and testing tools, making it easier for users to learn, debug, and improve their work.

items.content_html: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
items.title: asilvafx/vite-react-boilerplate:  A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
